extendedInfo.description: Discover your must-see TV with the BuddyTV Guide, the customizable channel guide that makes it easy to create your own personalized TV lineup, find new shows youâll love and never miss your favorites. It is the only full featured Electronic Program Guide for Google TV. On your Android Smartphone or Tablet it is your remote control!âââââ - "...way better than any other TV channel guide"Listings as unique as you are.â¢ Your favorite TV, organized by channel & airtimeâ¢ Filter the full lineup by program type or moodâ¢ Recommendations help you find new favoritesâ¢ Integrates online options like Netflix & AmazonNever miss an episode again.â¢ See all your favorites organized in your Watch List (Mobile)â¢ Customizable reminders alert you of new airings (Mobile)â¢ "Most Popular" shows what others are watchingâ¢ Special curated listings for sports, movies & moreMore control over your viewing experience.â¢ Tap to tune in -- itâs also a remote control!* (Mobile)â¢ Read detailed show info, articles & slideshowsâ¢ Rate shows and chat with other fansâ¢ Post your thoughts directly to Facebook & Twitter*BuddyTV Guide remote control works DirecTV DVRs, Sony Internet TV with Google TV, Logitech Revue, TiVo Series 3, TiVo Premier, any devices controlled by Google TV, and Samsung Smart TVs.Read the reviews and see why there's no better channel guide out there -- and it's absolutely free!**********"Buddy TV has a beautiful user interface... It doesn't get much better than this." - AppAdvice"Best little feature is the ability to heart just your favorite channelsâ¦" - Techcrunch"Tune into your favorite showsâ¦ with one less touch of the old school remote.â - Engadget"The guide and recommendation engine are impressive... it's worth checking out.â - TUAW**********More about the BuddyTV Guide:BuddyTV Guide provides listings for cable and satellite TV providers in the US. These include AT&T U-verse, Comcast, Cablevision, Time Warner, Verizon, DirecTV, Dish and many more.Tell us what you love about the BuddyTV Guide and be the first to learn about updates:GO: buddytv.com/buddytv-guide.aspxLIKE: facebook.com/buddytvguideFOLLOW: twitter.com/buddytvguide

reviews.title: It works great for listings but...
reviews.comment: Puts a notification on my status bar with no sound. So unless you are checking your phone every minute you could miss a new episode.
reviews.author: Matthew Bay

reviews.title: Still a lot of bugs!
reviews.comment: Channel Blacklisting does not work among many other things!
reviews.author: Sandra Branson

reviews.title: sounds good on papet but...
reviews.comment: cool features but crashes often and resource hog
reviews.author: Anthony Stellarini

reviews.title: Not compatible with ICS?
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using it on my Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 without issues. OS was HC 3.2. Worked great. Just updated my tab to ICS 4.0.4. When I try to reinstall the app, says not compatible with this version. Update coming? I really like this app. Four stars, but five when it works with ICS. Update 8/16: Just tried to d/l again and it worked. One of my favorite apps is once again up and running. Thanks, dev! UPDATE 6/23/13: Since the last update the app doesn\'t retain my favorites listing. Also, even though my cable provider is correct in the app, the channel lineup is wrong.I have to keep rebooting my tablet to correct theses issues. Will work for a while, then back to the problems. Downgraded my rating to one star as these issues make the app all but useless. When fixed, back to five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful idea
reviews.comment: It seems like this app was rushed. It\'s slow and buggy. Instead of adding new features, try fixing the ones you have. There is so much potential here, so I\'ll be sticking around.
reviews.author: Kirsten Roberts

reviews.title: update gone south
reviews.comment: UNINSTALLED      Since last update hangs and force closes   MANY many times have to power down to get back use of unit  just does not like GOOGLE TV
reviews.author: Jim Springer

reviews.title: Waste of time!
reviews.comment: I\'m uninstalling after about 50 attempts to register & use the app. If you don\'t want it linked to your Facebook acc\'t it gives you nothing but error messages. Very disappointed!

reviews.title: Slow, crashes a lot
reviews.comment: Works better ios. 4s user to galaxy s4 affective.  Expected way better operation with a superior phone. Feels like a big step back to me.
